question: What is MediShield Life?
text:
MediShield Life is a basic health insurance plan for all Singapore Citizens and Permanent Residents, protecting against large medical bills regardless of age or pre-existing conditions <cite> <doc>bb3bc5b3Ministry2024 pages 1-3 quote1</doc> <doc>bb3bc5b3Ministry2024 pages 1-5 quote1</doc></cite>.  Even with pre-existing conditions, coverage is provided, though an additional premium may apply for the first ten years <cite> <doc>bb3bc5b3Ministry2024 pages 1-3 quote2</doc><doc>bb3bc5b3Ministry2024 pages 1-3 quote3</doc></cite>.  MediSave funds can be used to pay premiums, including any additional amounts <cite> <doc>bb3bc5b3Ministry2024 pages 1-3 quote4</doc></cite>.

This basic plan covers hospitalizations and selected outpatient treatments <cite> <doc>bb3bc5b3Ministry2024 pages 1-5 quote3</doc></cite>.  While it covers both subsidized and non-subsidized treatments, the latter will have a smaller portion covered <cite> <doc>bb3bc5b3Ministry2024 pages 1-5 quote4</doc><doc>bb3bc5b3Ministry2024 pages 1-5 quote5</doc></cite>.  Claims involve deductibles and co-insurance <cite> <doc>bb3bc5b3Ministry2024 pages 1-5 quote7</doc><doc>bb3bc5b3Ministry2024 pages 1-5 quote8</doc></cite>.  To enhance coverage, Integrated Shield Plans (IPs) can supplement MediShield Life <cite> <doc>bb3bc5b3Ministry2024 pages 1-5 quote9</doc></cite>.  The government provides subsidies to keep premiums affordable <cite> <doc>bb3bc5b3Ministry2024 pages 1-5 quote2</doc></cite>.  No one loses coverage due to inability to pay premiums <cite> <doc>bb3bc5b3Ministry2024 pages 1-5 quote10</doc></cite>.
